Introduction: Hello, I am Aurelia. Nice to meet you.
divorced: I cannot believe that you would do such thing to me, knowing how I have lived. There is resentment, but it's fine. Good bye, @.
breakUp: ...#$b#You probably thought I would cry and beg to not leave me alone in the dark, but no.#$b#You have made you choice and I accept.
dumped_Girls: I heard what you did. You are wasting your life on doing something wrong. Don't talk to me.
secondChance_Girls: @... Afterall, you have saved my life. I forgive you. Let's try it again.
Mon: I am reading a book about phsychology. It is a fascinating topic that I would want to know more about.
Mon8: It's easy to forgive others once you have forgiven yourself.
Mon10: @, you never fail to brighten up my world.$l
Tue: Hello, how are you feeling today?$h
Tue8: At first, I was resentful... but now I decided to accept my past as it is.#$b#Afterall, the world is still beautiful.$h
Tue10: I wonder what it will be like to have a nice, warm, normal... family.#$b#Even the thought of me made me scared before, but now... it seems nice.$h
Wed: Oh, dear. Look at me! I forgot to return a book! I hope Gunther won't get too mad.$h
Wed8: @, you wonderous creature!$h#$b#That was a compliment, you see.$h
Wed10: Hmm, should I tell you a secret?$h#$b#The rabbit I followed that day was a green witch.$h#$b#She locked me up in the house. I don't know if she was being cruel or trying to teach me a... wicked lesson?
Thu: Don't you just love how you can look up to the sky? Appreciate the small things, @.$h
Thu8: What a wonderful day, don't you think? The weather doesn't matter that much.$h#$b#The important thing is that we are here, living today.$h
Thu10: @, I have been waiting to see you! My day without you feels like something crucial is missing.$l
Fri: Hello, what are you up to? I like to read. What do you like to do?$h
Fri8: What a lovely day. A perfect day to read a good book.$h
Fri10: Hello, dear. Came to see me? Well, that's nice of you.$l
Sat: I love to learn new things. It's fascinating.$h
Sat8: Come by my house whenever you feel tired. I will get you something to drink.$h
Sat10: You have been wonderful to me, @. I am so thankful that I can say that.$l
Sun8: I don't know what you think, but I like my hair short! It is so light and fluffy!$h
Sun10: @! I don't have nightmares these days. I rather dream about...$h#$b#Well, I'm not going to say. It's embarassing.$l
spring_Wed: Aren't the flowers so wonderful? It brightens up my day.$h
spring_Sat: Hello, @. Spring seems magical to me. Look at how everything blossomed!$h
summer_Mon: Summer is hot, but it's a good kind of hot. It feels like the sun is hugging me tight.$h
summer_Thu: People are very active around summer! I want to try icecream sometime.$h
summer_Fri: Hello, @! You are sweating so much! Here, take a drink. [348]
fall_Fri: Ooh, I love this sweet scent of fall.$h
fall_Sat: Eveyln made me a pumpkin soup last night. It was the greatest thing I have ever tasted in my life!$h
winter_Wed: I think I am getting a bit too cold.$s
winter_Sun: I don't like how cold it is, but I sure do like snow! So soft and cute!
give_flowersA: ...!#$b#Yes! I can't believe this is happening to me...!$l
give_pendant: I... I don't know what to say... But I know one thing for sure.#$b#I truly love you! I will prepare everything in three days.$l
stardrop_gift: You can't imagine how much you mean to me, @.$h#$b#You shone light into my life. It's a gift I got for you to show you thanks and love.$l
reject_two_heartA: Sorry, I don't know you well enough.
reject_two_heartB: Sorry, I don't want to get serious with you.
reject_four_heartA: Oh, @. Sorry, I don't think I can accept this.
reject_four_heartB: @, I do not feel like that towards you.
engageA: Aren't you engaged? Get out of here.$a
engageB: You are insane, @. No. You are engaged.$a
marriedA: Who do you think you are? You are married. Get that away from me.$a
marriedB: So is this how you treat your family? You are disgusting. You are married.$a
refusal_no_heartsB: Sorry, I don't think I know you.
refusal_knownA: @, I am sorry. But I can't right now.
refusal_knownB: @, I am sorry. I don't think I can right now.
spring_12: First festival of the year! I am so excited for tomorrow!$h
spring_23: Are you going to dance tomorrow? Just wondering.$l
summer_10: I wonder what the mayor will think of the soup this year.$h
summer_28: Are you ready for the beautiful scene tonight?$h
fall_15: So many interesting, new things are going to be presented tomorrow at the fair! I am excited!$h
fall_27: I.. think I might get a bit scared for tonight's festival.$s
winter_7: I am going to bulid the biggest snowman! It's the Ice Festival tomorrow!$h
winter_24: I love the Winter Star Festival. It gives me a good feeling inside.$l
event_poem1: Oh...? Okay then. There is no need to be rude though.$a
event_poem2: Why are you talking like that? Are you jealous or something?$a
event_poem3: Great! Here is goes. Don't tease.$h#$b#There is no light in the room. There is no wonder.#$b#There is nothing but wet night. Raining upon me.#$b#Then a stream of stars knocked on the door.#$b#'Who is it?' I ask.#$b#Stranger, that was who you are. A good, good stranger.#$b#You lighten up the dim dark.#$b#You are my brightest star in my night sky.#$b#...#$b#%Aurelia seems to be in a deep thought, remembering her old days.#$b#Did you... like that?$h
event_poem4: Alright then. If you say so.
Resort_Entering: Hello, it is nice to see you here.$h
Resort_Shore: The wind and the ocean tastes like freedom.$h
Resort_Wander: I'm looking for some pretty pebbles.$h
Resort_Bar: Are you here for a drink too?
Resort: I love this place so much.$h
